error.message: ValidationVisitor exceeded the maximum configured validation depth '32' when validating type 'MagicBoxAdminPortal.Models.Retailer'. This may indicate a very deep or infinitely recursive object graph. Consider modifying 'MvcOptions.MaxValidationDepth' or suppressing validation on the model type.
